titleStmt.title: SII 7.64: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 64. (A.R. No. 60 of 1900). ON THE NORTH WALL OF THE VERANDAH IN FRONT OF THE STAMBHESVARA TEMPLE, RIGHT OF ENTRANCE, AT SIYAMANGALAM, SAME TALUK AND DISTRICT.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . kopparakecaripaṟmaṟkku yāṇṭu Aiñcāvatu jayaṅkoṇṭacoḻamaṇṭalattup palakuṉṟakkoṭṭattu teṉṉā
ṟṟūrnāṭṭu ciyamaṅkalattu tirukkaṟṟaḷimahātevaṟkku śrīpāṇṭināṭṭu vecālippāṭi vaṭakarai kiḻkūrnāṭṭup pullāli veḷ
ḷāḷaṉ kāḷi pūṇṭiyeṉ vaitta tirunun=tāviḷakku Onṟukkum koṇṭu viṭṭa nilamāvatu periErip peruntūmpiṉ peruvākkāl kiḻmelppuṟṟa
mpulattup perumaṇalipperuñceṟu Eṭṭu māvum nan=ti muḻāṉ
tūmpil nan=timuḻāṉvāykkāliṉ teṉpāṟ kiṭan=ti viṭṭil kuṇṭil Iraṇṭu māvum Āka nilam pattu māvum ciyamaṅkala
ttūrāriṭaip poṉṉaṟa Iṭṭu maṇṇaṟakkoṇṭu viṭṭeṉ Innilattukkuc cilliṟai coṟumāṭum veṭṭi muṭ
ṭaiĀḷum ceññirramañciyum maṟṟum Epperpaṭṭaṉa kāṭṭavum collavum peṟātomākavum Innilattukku poṉ ṉaṟakko
ṇṭu vilaiAṟa viṟṟu kuṭuttom ciyamaṅkalattūromey celuttuvippatāka poṉ ṉaṟakkoṇṭu maṇṇaṟa viṟṟom ciyamaṅkalattūro
m Itu paṉmāheśvara rakṣai Aṟamaṟavaṟkka Itu kāttāṉ śrīpāta meṉ talaimeliṉa
Digital edition of SII 7.64 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
